Eric Garris bụ onye (amụrụ na Disemba 24, 1953) ọ bụ kwa onye na-eme ihe ike na nnwere onwe na United States, na-alaghachi na Agha Vietnam
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi weebụ nke Antiwar.com nke a malitere na 1995.
A mụrụ Garris na Paris, France ma zụlite ya na Southern California site na afọ abụọ
Ọ malitere itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ dị obere, na-ahazi nzukọ na ikesa akwụkwọ nta na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Los Angeles ma na-eguzogide agha Vietnam na draft

Dị ka nwa red diaper, Garris gara ngagharị iwe na ngagharị iwe maka ikike obodo mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, a chụpụrụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị maka ịkpali ọgba aghara mgbe ọ dị shekara iri na isii, ọ ghọkwara onye na-eguzogide agha Vietnam n'oge ọ bụ okenye. O weere onwe ya dị ka onye aka ekpe n'ihe ka ukwuu n'afọ ndị mbụ ya, mana ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ gbanwere mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri abụọ

Mgbe ọ bi na Venice, California n'afọ ndị 1960, Garris malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na Peace and Freedom Party, na-eje ozi dị ka National Committeeman na osote onyeisi oche tupu o guzobe otu nnwere onwe n'ime pati ahụ na afọ 1973
N'afọ 1975, ọ hapụrụ Peace and Freedom Party iji rụọ ọrụ na Libertarian Party, n'ikpeazụ ya na Justin Raimondo guzobere Libertarian Radical Caucus
N'afọ 1980, Garris na Raimondo hapụrụ Libertarian Party iji sonye na Republican Party
Ha guzobere Kọmitii Na-ahazi Kọmitii Libertarian Republican (LROC) ma kwado Pat Buchanan na 1992 ọ na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala
Na mkpụrụ ụbọchị ise na onwa Nọvemba, 2018, Garris lụrụ Susana Simon Pio si São Paulo, Brazil.
Garris kwuru na nguzo ya na-emegide agha dị ka otu ihe na-adịgide adịgide n'oge ọganihu nke echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya ma kwuo na ịbụ onye na-emegid agha dugara ya na nnwere onwe
Echiche ya na agha bụ onye kachasị mebie ikike mmadụ na ihe onwunwe gosipụtara na ọrụ Antiwar.com iji duzie ihe na-adịghị etinye aka na United States na mba ofesi.
Dị ka onye na-akwado ikike nwoke na nwanyị, Garris na-arụsi ọrụ ike na imegide ma merie 1978 Briggs Initiative, nke onye omeiwu steeti John V
Briggs, (R-Fullerton) dere

Onye ụkọchukwu Universal Free Libertarian Church, Garris mere ndokwa ka ọ rụrịta ụka Senator Briggs na Mahadum California State, Fullerton (CSUF) na Ọktoba 26, 1978. Awa ole na ole tupu arụmụka ahụ, nke Society for Libertarian Life kwadoro, Briggs apụtaghị ma dochie Prọfesọ

George Kent Onye enyemaka Brigg, Don Sizemore, mechara kwuo na onye omeiwu ahụ nwetara ọtụtụ egwu ọnwụ tupu arụmụka ahụ. Garris bụ otu n'ime ndị gbara akwụkwọ anọ tinyere akwụkwọ mmebi nkwekọrịta megide Briggs, nke onye ọka iwu Newport Beach bụ David Bergland gbara akwụkwọ.
N'afọ 2000, Garris kọwara akụkọ ihe mere eme ya na Libertarian Party (LP) dị ka ndị a:
N'afọ 1973, sonyeere m na Libertarian Party
E jere m ozi dị ka onye otu Kọmitii Mba, onye nduzi steeti California, na onye na-azọ ọkwa na onye njikwa mkpọsa ọtụtụ ugboro
Abụ m onye otu LP, mana anaghịzi edebanye aha m na LP
Ana m ewere onwe m dị ka onye nnwere onwe nwere nkwenkwe siri ike ma, dị ka Webmaster nke Antiwar.com na LewRockwell.com, na-ewere onwe m dị hi onye na-eme ihe na nnwere onwe
Ana m agụ ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ LP, enwere ọtụtụ ndị enyi na ndị mmekọ na LP, ọbụnakwa na-atụ vootu Libertarian
Ana m adenye aha na ndepụta mkparịta ụka email dị n'ime LP.

Mgbe Murray Rothbard na ndị na-akwado ya malitere iche na Libertarian Party, site na uwe ndị dị ka Cato Institute, na-aghọ ihe na-atọ ụtọ na Republican Party na ụkpụrụ ya, ha guzobere "Libertarian Radical Caucus" nke Garris na onye ya na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ Justin Raimondo duziri. Mgbe nnukwu nkewa nke Libertarian Party nke afọ 1983, ha malitere usoro ịbanye na Republican Party, na n'ime afọ ndị 1990 ha ghọrọ ndị nkwado siri ike nke Pat Buchanan.
Eric Garris gbara ọsọ maka ọkwa ọchịchị na afọ 1972 mgbe ọ gbara ọsọ dị ka onye Peace and Freedom Party maka Nzukọ Steeti California na mpaghara 61
O nwetara vootu 3,488 maka 3.8% nke vootu. Garris gbara ọsọ maka ọkwa nke ugboro abụọ na 1974

N'ịgba ọsọ dị ka onye Peace and Freedom Party na 22 State Senate district, Garris nwetara 4,316 vootu maka 2.3% N'afọ 1980, Garris gbara ọsọ dị ka nnwere onwe maka oche Senate nke 5 nke California State. N'asọmpi ụzọ abụọ, Garris nwetara vootu 21,162 maka 14.6% nke vootu. N'afọ 1983, Garris gbara ọsọ dị ka onye nnwere onwe na ntuli aka pụrụ iche maka mpaghara nke ise nke California. O nwetara vootu 408 maka 0.5% nke ngụkọta vootu. N'afọ 1990, Garris gbara ọsọ dị ka onye Republican maka Nzukọ nke Steeti California na mpaghara nke 21
O nwetara vootu 25,695 maka 29.1% nke vootu n'ụzọ abụọ agbụrụ

Na mbido, Garris hụrụ ikike ịntanetị nwere iji kwalite nkwenkwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya. N'afọ 1995, o guzobere Antiwar.com na nzaghachi maka ntinye aka nke gọọmentị Clinton na agha obodo Bosnia. Tọrọ ntọala na echiche Randolph Bourne na "Agha bụ Ahụike nke Steeti," Antiwar.com na-agbakọta njikọ akụkọ gbasara iwu mba ọzọ site n'echiche dịgasị iche iche iji mee ka ndị America na ụwa mara banyere atụmatụ mba ofesi nke gọọmentị America ma bụrụ ngwá ọrụ nyocha maka "'ndị ọkachamara ụmụ amaala.'"
Site na 1999 ruo 2012, Garris bụ webmaster maka LewRockwell.com, webmagazine nke onye na-akọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Lew Rockwell
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka webụ maka Ballot Access News, ebe nrụọrụ weebụ akụkọ nke onye na-eme ihe ike Richard Winger bipụtara nke na-eme ka a mara banyere iwu ndị na-egbochi ịtụ vootu.
